activities:
Waters collects and uses personal information for the following purposes:

•	To allow visitors to the Waters website to register for additional information, contact etc.
•	To respond to subscriptions to Waters service
•	To respond to requests for further services
•	To report problems with the website.
•	To keep reports to contact with website users.
•	To collect research information from our website users, customers and potential customers.
•	To document the details of transactions website users carry out through the website 
•	To fulfil customer orders.
•	To track website traffic data, website visitor location data, weblogs and other communication data which may be required for Waters billing purposes or otherwise.
•	To conduct employment related maters using certain personal information such as name, date of birth, gender, marital status, and identification numbers including social security, driver's license, tax identification, passport numbers, background information, including education (schools and dates attended, and degrees or diplomas obtained), training, work history (names of former employers, dates of employment, and compensation information), military and veteran status, and criminal arrests, indictments, convictions, financial information such as salary, stock option grants and tax, contact information such as home and office addresses, home, office and mobile telephone numbers, home and office e-mail addresses, health and medical information, including personal, contact, and health information for employees, their spouses and dependants, the results of applicant and employee drug tests, information relating to injuries or sickness whilst at work, company work history, experience, training, compensation information (including salary, bonus, options and benefits) and employment performance;
•	To conduct Waters company car program Waters may collect state driver's records for drivers of company cars;
•	To conduct benefit programs Waters may collect information relating to employee’s dependants for the purposes of enrolling with relevant Waters benefit schemes and beneficiary information.
